Posts.Content: Oct 3, 2013 10:43PM Supersonic_Woman wrote: Hi Bevtom 18 - did you read my post? I too have a red patch on one of my breasts and just got up the courage to post my info tonight.  Hopefully someone can help us.  All I ask is don't plan to make an appointment with your GP - do it please!
Posts.Title: red/light purple patch -just need a second opinion. bevtom_18 exbrnxgrl

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2013 08:50AM Supersonic_Woman wrote: Thanks everyone!  Another sleepless night but part of it was spent reading posts on this site and again just can't get over the courage so evident from all.  Ariom, I'm from Canada and my name was taken from Queen's song Don't Stop Me Now.  Huge fan of music (especially Queen) and that's what I do when I get a little down.  Plug in my I-pod and dance in the kitchen. Maybe I should be listening to Queen's song "I'm Going Slightly Mad".  And I will try and stay off google.  I feel so much better already after having posted last nite because I have not talked to anyone about my fears.  I've talked to my neighbour but I have just laughed it off and said if there is a problem it will keep me busy in my retirement.  I'll keep you posted!
Posts.Title: A little frightened Supersonic_Woman Ariom

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2013 01:38PM Supersonic_Woman wrote: I've decided I'm not going to worry about this. I'm going slightly mad while worrying. My appt is on Tuesday for my mammogram, which is not that far away. So, I will have a good weekend, lunch with my friends on Monday and then deal with things after that. Que sera, sera.
Posts.Title: A little frightened Supersonic_Woman Ariom

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2013 03:36PM Supersonic_Woman wrote: I believe I just read that your mother in law is ill. Can't believe that with everything going on in your life that you have time to reach out to someone that has not even received a diagnosis. I just can't believe everyone on this site. You folks are amazing. Please know that I am thinking about you and sending you back a hug! Take care of yourself please. There appear to be a lot of good ones on this site but you seem to be particularly caring.
Posts.Title: A little frightened Supersonic_Woman Ariom
